channel.title: Hello, please Help me
channel.description: Hello, Im new with making servers. All i got is a client and a source. How do i put the server online so I and other people can play it? and how can i make myself owner and give positions and that good stuff lol. I will be very thankful if you could reply. Thank you.

item.title: Hello, please Help me
item.dc:creator: @imstrength imstrength
item.description:
@imstrength wrote:

mr extremez:

Depends what type of server you have but most of the time you change ranks in the characters folders, also to get your server online you will have to port forward and probably find a guide over your router on portforward.com

this but after you portforward you will need to make sure your client is set for your ip adress before you just give it to people

Read full topic
